      public java.lang.String registerTrader​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) throws java.io.IOException, UserAlreadyExistsException
      Registers a new trader into the system
      Parameters:
      username - username of new trader
      password - password for new trader
      Returns:
      id of the newly registered trader
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - file path is bad
      UserAlreadyExistsException - can't register a user that already exists

      password - password of existing user
      Returns:

      Throws:

    • freezeUser

      public void freezeUser​(java.lang.String username, boolean freezeStatus) throws EntryNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Freezes/Unfreezes a Trader given their username Requirement: Only an Admin Account can preform this action
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the Trader that needs to be (un-)frozen
      freezeStatus - if true, method will freeze the Trader, else it will unFreeze
      Throws:
      EntryNotFoundException - can't find username
      AuthorizationException - not allowed to freeze user

    • trade

      public boolean trade​(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String secondUserName, java.util.Date firstMeeting, java.util.Date secondMeeting, java.lang.String meetingLocation, int lendItemIndex, int borrowItemIndex) throws EntryNotFoundException, java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      2-way trade method
      Parameters:
      userId - id of the logged-in user
      secondUserName - username of the want-to-trade with user
      firstMeeting - Date of the first meeting
      secondMeeting - Date of the second meeting
      meetingLocation - Location of both meetings
      lendItemIndex - index of the item that will be lent to
      borrowItemIndex - index of the item that will be borrowed
      Returns:
      true if the trade has been processed successfully
      Throws:
      EntryNotFoundException - userId not found
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException

    • lendItem

      public boolean lendItem​(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String secondUserName, java.util.Date firstMeeting, java.util.Date secondMeeting, java.lang.String meetingLocation, int lendItemIndex) throws EntryNotFoundException
      1-way Trade Method: logged-in user giving an item to another user
      Parameters:
      userId - id of the logged-in user
      secondUserName - username of the want-to-trade with user
      firstMeeting - Date of the first meeting
      secondMeeting - Date of the second meeting
      meetingLocation - Location of both meetings
      lendItemIndex - index of the item that will be lent
      Returns:
      true if the trade was processed successfully
      Throws:
      EntryNotFoundException - userId not found

    • editTrade

      public boolean editTrade​(java.lang.String userID, java.lang.String traderId, java.lang.String tradeID, java.util.Date firstMeeting, java.util.Date secondMeeting, java.lang.String meetingLocation, int inventoryItemIndex, int traderInventoryItemIndex) throws EntryNotFoundException, CannotTradeException
      edits the trade object
      Parameters:
      userID - id of the user
      traderId - id of the other user of the trade
      tradeID - id of the trade
      firstMeeting - first meeting date object
      secondMeeting - second meeting date object
      meetingLocation - String of the meeting location
      inventoryItemIndex - index of the user's trade item
      traderInventoryItemIndex - index of the trader's trade item
      Returns:
      true
      Throws:
      EntryNotFoundException - if user or trade can not be found
      CannotTradeException - if the trade is not allowed
